name: BASIC Stamp 2 Code File
summary: Learn about .BS2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The BASIC Stamp Editor for Windows is developed and supported by Parallax, while the editors for Mac and Linux are developed by third parties.

description: Program code for a Parallax BASIC Stamp module or microcontroller; often used for educational hardware programming projects; saved in a text format that can be opened in a text editor.
